test rapidité boucle for vs map vs foreach  avec multiples conditions et un grand nb d'itérations

const arr = ''.split('');
let a = [];

for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
  if (
    arr[i].includes('a') ||
    arr[i].includes('b') ||
    arr[i].includes('c') ||
    arr[i].includes('d') ||
    arr[i].includes('e') ||
    arr[i].includes('f') ||
    arr[i].includes('g')
  ) {
    a.push(arr[i]);
  }
}

arr.map((i) => {
  if (
    i.includes('a') ||
    i.includes('b') ||
    i.includes('c') ||
    i.includes('d') ||
    i.includes('e') ||
    i.includes('f') ||
    i.includes('g')
  ) {
    a.push(i);
  }
});

arr.forEach((i) => {
  if (
    i.includes('a') ||
    i.includes('b') ||
    i.includes('c') ||
    i.includes('d') ||
    i.includes('e') ||
    i.includes('f') ||
    i.includes('g')
  ) {
    a.push(i);
  }
});
